description:
Uh Oh!  Dot rolled too close to the volcano!  
Help Dot cool down to avoid a meltdown.

puzzles.description: Make Dot turn the lights off when the top button is pressed. Then make Dot automatically say "Ha ha hot!"

hints.description: Link Start to the light using a Top Button Pressed cue. Link the light to the sound using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After saying "Ha ha hot!", make Dot automatically turn on red lights. Then make Dot wait for 3.0 s then play the siren sound.

hints.description: Link the "Ha ha hot!" sound to the Red light using an Auto cue. Link the Red light to the Siren sound using a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s.

puzzles.description: After the siren sound, make Dot wait for 2.0 s then play the short rocket boost sound. After the short rocket boost, make Dot turn the lights off when the top button is pressed.
puzzles.introduction: If it gets too hot, Dot's circuits will have a meltdown! When that happens, we can reset Dot by pressing the top button.

hints.description: Link the Siren sound to the Short Rocket Boost sound using a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s. Link the Short Rocket Boost sound to the Lights Off state using a Top Button Pressed cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on red lights, make Dot play the Nervous #1 sound when Dot feels a drop. After the Nervous #1 sound, make Dot automatically turn on orange lights.
puzzles.introduction: When the red light turns on, let's give Dot a quick toss in the air to help Dot cool down.

hints.description: Link the Red light to the Nervous #1 sound using a Drop cue. Link the Nervous #1 sound to the Orange light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on orange lights, make Dot play the Nervous #2 sound when Dot feels a drop. After the Nervous #2 sound, make Dot automatically turn on yellow lights.
puzzles.introduction: The more you toss and catch Dot, the cooler Dot will get!

hints.description: Link the Orange light to the Nervous #2 sound using a Drop cue. Link the Nervous #2 sound to the Yellow light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on yellow lights, make Dot play the Nervous #3 sound when Dot feels a drop. After the Nervous #3 sound, make Dot automatically turn on cyan lights.

hints.description: Link the Yellow light to the Nervous #3 sound using a Drop cue. Link the Nervous #3 sound to the Cyan light using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning on cyan lights, make Dot automatically say "Yes" then automatically return to Start.
puzzles.introduction: Phew!  Looks like Dot is starting to cool down.
